snippet: The halfway house system, plagued by escapes, gang activity, sexual attacks and rampant drug use, is attracting increased scrutiny from lawmakers.
abstract: New Jersey lawmakers step up their calls for more scrutiny of the state's troubled halfway house system, announcing plans for hearings and demanding that the Corrections Department explain its mismanagement and neglect.
lead_paragraph: The halfway house system, plagued by escapes, gang activity, sexual attacks and rampant drug use, is attracting increased scrutiny from lawmakers.

headline.seo: New Jersey Lawmakers Will Hold Hearings on Halfway House System
headline.main: Trenton Lawmakers Plan Review of Halfway Houses
headline.print_headline: Trenton Lawmakers Plan Review of Halfway Houses
